games.name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
games.review: A masterpiece of storytelling and world-building, with incredible depth and attention to detail.

games.name: God of War
games.review: A stunning reimagining of the franchise with emotional depth and brutal combat.

games.name: The Last of Us Part II
games.review: A technically brilliant but divisive game with incredible gameplay and narrative ambition.

games.name: Hollow Knight
games.review: A beautifully crafted metroidvania with challenging gameplay and a haunting atmosphere.

games.name: Cyberpunk 2077
games.review: A flawed but ambitious RPG with an incredible world and story, despite technical issues.

games.name: Animal Crossing: New Horizons
games.review: A charming and relaxing life simulator that provided comfort during difficult times.

games.name: Death Stranding
games.review: A uniquely experimental game that divides players with its unconventional gameplay loop.

games.name: Anthem
games.review: A disappointing live-service game with solid core mechanics but lacking content and vision.
